review_title: Great experience if you love to learn!
pros: Distance work available, complete autonomy of interns which is a lot different from every internships I had. I learnt a lot and had a wonderful time there with very dedicated and professional people.
cons: Maybe too much autonomy? But that is just me. No pressure at all may be counter productive some time.

review_title: Flexible schedules... but too much bureaucracy
pros: TELUQ offers flexible schedules and lots of freedom. The environment is  generally low-stress.
cons: It is typically very bureaucratic, with silly forms for everything. Meetings are extremely long... some meetings can last for more than a day.
